run.summary: Deep research session validating organic schema growth thesis. Spawned 7-agent team for comprehensive market/academic/technical analysis. Synthesized findings into 7-phase Agent SDK implementation plan with test gates. Plan validated against all research findings.

what-worked.item: Team research validated core thesis: organic schema growth is feasible and proven
Devil's Advocate identified critical safety gaps before implementation
Phased plan with test gates provides clear execution path
Biological metaphor reframed as blueprint, not decoration
User insight: "Nature already solved coordination through 4B years of evolution"

what-didnt.item: Initial request for "grunt agents" (groq/ollama/gemini) couldn't spawn actual child processes - designed into plan instead

key-decisions.decision: P0 safety guards must ship before any auto-pruning
Implement reef MCP server exposing polip operations
Route external-ok tasks to Groq/Ollama/Gemini, reserve Claude for judgment
Calcification engine with time × usage × consensus triggers
Audit trail + dry-run for all automatic operations

research-findings.finding: 92% alignment with human-crafted schemas via unsupervised induction
$24M Series A - memory infrastructure is funded category
Became de facto standard protocol (Linux Foundation)

next-session.step: Begin Phase 0: Create directory structure for agent SDK
Phase 1 (CRITICAL): Implement safety guards before any automation
